Name: Tipperary No.1
Ingredients: 10 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: Chartreuse fans will love this Irish whiskey-forward nightcap.
History: Adapted from a recipe that first appeared in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1916 Recipes for Mixed Drinks where he stipulates equal parts.
Nutrition: One serving of Tipperary No.1 contains 140 calories
